\makeatletter
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%% User specified LaTeX commands.
\usepackage{culmus}

\makeatother

\usepackage{babel}
\begin{document}
\textbf{Question 8:}

\textbf{(A)}

We have D features and want to choose b of them ($1\leq b\leq D$) 

The number of possible sets by choosing b features from D is $\left(\begin{array}{c}
D\\
b
\end{array}\right)=\frac{D!}{(D-b)!\ b!}$ 

total number of set is summing for every value of b:

\[
\boldsymbol{|P(s)|=\sum_{i=1}^{D}\left(\begin{array}{c}
D\\
i
\end{array}\right)=2^{D}-1}
\]

note: we used a well known formula: $\sum_{i=0}^{D}\left(\begin{array}{c}
D\\
i
\end{array}\right)=2^{D}$ so $\sum_{i=1}^{D}\left(\begin{array}{c}
D\\
i
\end{array}\right)=\sum_{i=0}^{D}\left(\begin{array}{c}
D\\
i
\end{array}\right)-\left(\begin{array}{c}
D\\
0
\end{array}\right)$

\textbf{(B)}

We have D features and want to choose b of them ($1\leq b\leq D$) 

The number of possible sets by choosing b features from D is \textbf{$\boldsymbol{\left(\begin{array}{c}
D\\
\boldsymbol{b}
\end{array}\right)=\frac{D!}{(D-b)!\ b!}}$ }
\end{document}
